{{{
Map<int, List<Person>> groupByZip(Iterable<Person> people) {
  var peopleByZip = new Map<int, List<Person>>();
  for (var person in people) {
    peopleByZip.putIfAbsent(person.zip, () => <Person>[]);
    peopleByZip[person.zip].add(person);
  }
  return peopleByZip;
}
